```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
AA_Data <- read_csv("AA_Data.csv", col_types = cols(`%RSD` = col_number(), 
    Analysis = col_number(), `Sample Key` = col_number()), 
    skip = 4) %>%
  rename(Sample.Key = "Sample Key")
View(AA_Data)

sample_key <- read.csv("~/Chemistry 313/Johnson Creek/Johnson_Creek_ICPMS/Sample_Key.csv", skip=0)
```

```{r}
AA_merged <- merge(sample_key, AA_Data)
```

```{r}
rm(list = setdiff(ls(), "AA_merged"))
```
